articles.title: MLS owners vote to shift soccer season to a summer-to-spring calendar in 2027
articles.description:
Under the new calendar, league play will begin in mid- to late July 2027, with the final day of the regular season in April 2028. The playoffs and championship will take place in May.

The post MLS owners vote to shift soccer season to a summer-to-spring calendar in 2027 appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: The best sports streaming options for Patriots, Red Sox, Bruins, and Celtics fans
articles.description:
